My Computer Properties Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

In the Project Explorer window, right-click My Computer and select Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use the Category list at the left side of the dialog box to set the following options.

  • General—Sets the IP address for the local computer.
  • VI Server—Configures the VI Server for the My Computer target, controls machine access to VIs through the VI Server for the My Computer target, identifies which VIs other applications can access through the VI Server for the My Computer target, and controls user access to VIs through the VI Server for the My Computer target.
  • Conditional Disable Symbols—Defines symbols to use with the Conditional Disable structure in any VI in the My Computer target.
  • MathScript—(MathScript RT Module) Configures the default search path list and specifies the working directory for LabVIEW MathScript.
  • Scan Engine—Configures NI Scan Engine settings.
